code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./Item.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{WishlistContext}from'../../Context/WishlistContext';import{ShopContext}from'../../Context/ShopContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Item=props=>{const{all_product}=useContext(ShopContext);const{isWishlisted,toggleWishlist}=useContext(WishlistContext);const wished=isWishlisted(props.id);const meta=all_product.find(p=>p.id===props.id)||props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(props.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:window.scrollTo(0,0),src:props.image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-prices",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-price-new",children:["$",props.new_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-price-old",children:["$",props.old_price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleWishlist(props.id,meta),className:"item-wishlist-btn","aria-label":wished?'Remove from wishlist':'Add to wishlist',style:{marginTop:8},children:wished?'♥ In Wishlist':'♡ Add to Wishlist'})]});};
